future.tools 0.0.0-9001
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Evaluate an R expression while collecting journals from completed futures

    gather_journals.Rd

    Evaluate an R expression while collecting journals from completed futures

    gather_journals(expr, substitute = TRUE, envir = parent.frame())

    Arguments

    expr

    The R expression to evaluate

    substitute

    If TRUE, then expr is subtituted, otherwise not.

    envir

    The environment where expr should be evaluated

    Value

    A list of FutureJournal:s.

    Examples

    library(future.apply)
#> Loading required package: future

slow_fcn <- function(x) {
  Sys.sleep(x / 10)
  sqrt(x)
}

plan(multisession, workers = 2)
js <- gather_journals({
  vs <- future_lapply(3:1, FUN = slow_fcn)
})
print(js)
